TEXT.S:
Cameronu Cameronsa i labu nu Feico, itiza i 6 00 N, 12 00 E, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 475,440 sq km, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 472,710 sq km, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 2,730 sq km hamin nu tademaw sa 24,360,803. kakalukan umah sa 20.60%, kilakilangan umah sa 41.70%, zumaay henay umah sa 37.70%. :République du Cameroun;:Republic of Cameroon:Cameroun;:Cameroon Cameron masakaputay a kanatalkamu nu Fa-ku, République du Cameroun, kamu nu Ing-ku, Republic of Cameroonu ngangan tu Cameron(kamu nu a Fa-ku, Cameroun kamu nu Ing-ku, Cameroon) uynian i Fay-cuw, tepan nutipan a sacacayay a masakaputay a kanatal, nutipan a Cameronmalalitin ku Nay-ci-li-ya, nutimulan nuamisan atu nuwalian macapi nu Ca-deatu Cung-biy-cung-he-kuo, nutimulan tu biyawbiyaw ku Ce-daw-ci-nye-yaCiy-pungatu Kang-ku-cung-he-ku, Camerona dadipasan salikecu nu Ban-ni-uan, nu Ci-ney-ya-uanatu Tay-si-yangu sahatiniay. Cameron""200CameronCameronCameronsacayhini masazumaay lala' atu lalangawan u nikayadah, sikaidaw ku ngangan tu "siaw-biy-cuw", sikahini u dahacayaazihan pasu nu bayuay u dadipasan atu likelikenan atu buyubuyu'an atu maudaday a kilakilangan atu akuti'ay a lutulutukan aim, itiniay u satalakaway a Ke-may-leng a silamalay a buyu' i satipan nu timulan, izaw ku tabakiay a tu-se i Tu-a-la, Ya-uang-te atu Ciy-lu-a amin, sakayhini i eneng malakuway tu tusa alasubuay a caay kalecad nu binacadan atu kamu nu binacadan.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Yaounde.
sapadateng nu kanatal demiadsapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 20 bulad 5 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Paul Biya, micakat a demiad sa i 1982 a mihca 11 bulad 6 demiad.
u hata u kulit nu hata nu Cameron sa, situlu ku kulit, u landaway, u sumanahay atu takuliyaway. sibunac i telung nu hata.
u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: u sulit nu Lipun: u sulit nu Amilika: Cameroon
laylay1884-Douala Cameronu kasumamadan i tiniay a tademaw ku pye-ke-mi a tademawi Pa-ka a niyazu'. musakamuay tu kamu nu satabalay i Cameron. talakaway a kenis, nika O-cow a tademaw ayawmidebung, uymahida malimat tu amin katukuh 1884 a mihcaan nu masatezep sa, hu-di tu Tu-a-laDoualau Cameronnu i tiniay u tatungusanay namakay i Fiy-cow i tizaay tu a hung-ti.
miliyas tu pidebungan a mihcaan196011""1961101""1984"" 1960 a mihcaan cacay a bulad cacay a demiad, Fa-kuw tungusay nu Cameron, patadu' mikuwan a kenis i kapulungan nu kanatal nikasasulit amikuwan tu nikaykian mamin nu sazikuzan pakinacacay sa mi patipa' ku tadeamaw, patatenga' amiliyas tu Fa-ku a mipikuwaan, pangangan sa tu ngangan nu kanatal Cameron masakaputay a kanatal. nikasahini sa, nukasahini u Yin-kuo ku mikuwanay Cameronmalecad tu binawlan ku misingkiway, tini i tungusay nu Iny-kou a kakitizaan tu wamisan a kakitizaan makaketun papulung tu Nay-ci-li-ya, nutimulang a kakitizaan paketung papulungan tu Cameron1961 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bulad cacay a dimiadngangan nu kanatal malimat tu Cameron-lian-bang-kung-he-dang. 1984 a mihcaan masumat tu ku ngangan u Cameron masakaputay a kanatalayza a demidad Cameronnu talakaway a kamu sakay i In-kou a kamu atu Fa-kou a kamu.
cen-ce19921972180 duduc tu 1992 a mihcaan tuynian 1972 a mihcaan nipasumadan a hulic, cung-tung situngus sapikuwan a kawaw, kung-tung ahebal ku sakuwan, atu caay piawas tu Kou-min-ta-huay anilubangan. Kou-min-ta-huay izaw ku 180 ku aenengan palekal tu tuyniay a tatengilan angangan u kawaw tu patizeng tu hulic. u huic a kawaw nuhulicay a sakatusa a sakaput, satalakaway a huing uyza dada' u kung-tung ku misalungucay kya taneng tuyni u hulic amikingsa kya amapabelingtuni nikawawan tu nu hulic.
mikawaway tu nu hekal--20%OIC Cameronsakaput pulung nu kanatal, u saayaway aca ciniza ayaw nu hamin a kanatal cayay ku midebungay nu Iyn-kou , milabu tu Ta-iyn-kou-sya a kanatal, Cameronuyzaan tu amihcaan tu sakatusa nu micunuday anipapikuwan tu kanatal, Fa-kou izaw ku nu kasumamadan a kacacayattu kapahay a cabay, kanahatu hamin nu kanatal 20% dada' ku tademaaw nu Mu-se-lin, ciniza nu Yi-se-lan-huy-i-zu-ceOIC aca a tademaw.
hekal a lala'1000-1500407019591501000-40006000 Cameronhelal lala' hinakakisumad, u buyu' amin, u talakaw 1000-1500 a mi, tepanay a lala' talakaw u talakaway a hekal a liwliw, satipan izaw masilut masamulmulay a tukun u silamalay a buyu', masaungcuyungcuyayCameronsilamalay a buyu', u satalakaw 4070 ami, u satalakaway a buyu' nu Si-bey, 1959 a mihcaan namabuwah tuway, satipan nutumulan lilis nu bayu kaahebal katukuh 150 a kung-li a masahelungay a lala', nuwamisan cacaledesan ku demiad, u caledesay a nalinabuan a demiad, namakay nuwamisan pasayza i nutimulan, u kadaledes nu kilakilangan a demiad, mahamin nu kakitizaan nikaudadan a niditekan 1000-4000 haw-mi, satipan nutimulan u silamalan a buyu'katukuh i 6000 haw-mi a katalakawhekalBernard Foahom200154296150002802751653190200900750150 duduc tu ni Bernard Foahom a cacay a lice nipatahekalantu nicekiwan, 2001 a mihcaan Cameronnaizaw kayadah ku 542 a lamanganku butingan, muzuma 96 a lamangan ku micideky a lamangan, namahini izaw hehay ku malakuwyday 15,000 a lamangan u sikinisay ci atipingpignay sapipinu cilkay, 280 a lamangan kumicucuay aadupan "pasu tabakiay atu adidi'ay a lamangan", 275 a lamangan nu nu minabuyay a aadupantu 165 a alamangaan, atu aca )tuluay alamangan u El-yuatu 190 katukuh i 200 alamangan u balautay, uzumaay, uynian a kanatal a kayadah izaw ku900 a lamangan cayay kalecat a lamangan a ayaman, uzuma 750 nuuynian nuCameronnuzuma 150 alamangan nu talastas a ayam.
lalculan10 Camerona kilangkilangan u ahebal i kitakita kahebal, izaw ku cacay bataan cedanu tabakiay a sauwac, yadah ku nanum, mamin i kanatal u yadahay nu tahakay a lalaculan. nipalumaan, tadasimal, kuhiy, paza', nu lahaday a kumu, alumi, alumiay alala' abu, muking ba'tu, kilang.
sakikalisiw2008GDP230010 2008 a mihcan, Camerona tademaway palalecad GDP "u picakay tu palalecad tu aca"(pulung tu nisulitan2300 nu Amilika a kalisiw, u satalakaway cacay bataan nu Sa-ha-la atu Bey-cou a kanatal. angangan sapatahekal a icibapasuFa-kou, Yi-ta-li, Han-kou, Siy-pan-ya atu Yin-kou. Cameronnu ging-ku "angangan a sakikalisiw",tepanay nu Fey-cou a kanatal u kapulung nu sakikalisiw atu Fey-cou u kusy nusiwbayay a kawaw a hulic u kalacacay sakaput nu kanatal.
tademaw1,500200 Camerona tademaw izaw tu 1,054 mang, katuud ku binacadan pakala tu 200 a katalakaw. kahemulan a kamu izaw ku Pang-tu binacadan a kamu atu Bi-ke-mi a tademaw
kamuCamerona cen-bu a kamu u Eing-kouu atu Fa-kow a kamu, cacay bataan ku belaw Nay-ci-li-ya tipan nuwamisan a kenis atu satipan nutimulan u kamu u Yin-kou a kamu.
